metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4904 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the c-ares package. The ares_set_sortlist is missing checks about the validity of the input string, which allows a possible arbitrary length stack overflow. This issue may cause a denial of service or a limited impact on confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: c-ares: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
